TopicTitle: [WIP][1.6.x_TEMPORARY FIX] NAS - Naval Artillery System 0.7.0 (BDAc Addon, WW2 Naval Weapons) - "Land of Dragon" - 2018/4/28

Articles.Content:
Any word on the torps?

We're working on that. That's all

All I can say is yes, the turrets are heavy. Like, I can't make an Atlanta class....

Although making a ship, that works, with these guns is not impossible....you just have to keep the CoM low by using weights and keeping heavy turrets at the bottom.

- - - Updated - - -

So....I can't tell if this guy likes landships or not.....

I LOVE Landships and Steampunk in general! yay!

We're working on that. That's all

[subtlehint]We want pictures[/subtlehint]

Also, I found a really cool-looking gun turret that I think would be neat to see.

It is similar in use and purpose to the IJN 10cm High-Angle gun, although in a much smaller mount.

Really good resource: http://3dhistory.de/wordpress/3d-models/dkm-bismarck/bismarck-high-res/4/

Also, I found a really cool-looking gun turret that I think would be neat to see.

It is similar in use and purpose to the IJN 10cm High-Angle gun, although in a much smaller mount.

http://3dhistory.de/wordpress/wp-content/gallery/105C33/10.5-detail01_0002.jpg

Really good resource: http://3dhistory.de/wordpress/3d-models/dkm-bismarck/bismarck-high-res/4/

(sees picture) DAAAAYYYY-UUMM!

(sees picture) DAAAAYYYY-UUMM!

ikr! There was also, if WoWs is any accurate, an 8.8cm version.
Hmmm...

Log:

Something we've been working on these days, to appreciate all your supports and advices, from the beginning to 10,000+ DLs today.

As for the German flak... to be honest I'm not quite willing to add more axis weapons out of the current list. They're already somehow overpowered now, and adding a gun with similar function with more than one existing weapons is not so wise. We'll consider that anyway.

Log:

http://i.imgur.com/Y9h5Do4.png

Something we've been working on these days, to appreciate all your supports and advices, from the beginning to 10,000+ DLs today.

As for the German flak... to be honest I'm not quite willing to add more axis weapons out of the current list. They're already somehow overpowered now, and adding a gun with similar function with more than one existing weapons is not so wise. We'll consider that anyway.

A Sten Gun?!?!

Cheery-O, mate!

Also, the main reason I think the SK C/33 would be good is because it is smaller than its IJN counterpart, although cannot go to as high angles.

Edited November 7, 2015 by minepagan

It's a three "barreled" torpedo launcher/tube system.

Kewl. How does it work?

My idea how the torpedo works is that you can rotate the torpedo tubes and fire them and they will deploy into the water while being pushed through the water and strike the hull of another warship making it go kaboom.

Log:

NAS works in 1.0.5 nicely and we're ready to finish the 0.2.6 update in several days.

BTW we've made this in collaboration with a video maker Ficko. Actually it contains almost nothing about contents of the mod but it's interesting.

Fire control radar! More dishes to put on my ships! Thank you!

Aw crap, now I'll have to split off a seperate BDA install again...

@Acea, first of all i wanted to thank you guys for this epic add-on!

A few days ago i was sure that it would be impossible to built an realistic battleship with these parts cause there to heavy. but then i figured it out and found a way to do it. more parts, so would it be possible to Minimalize the

physic calculations that KSP is doing, so where able to build ships with an custom bridge, small aa guns, and manly an kinda custom hull

if you guys want, i could upload a pic when done with the prototype.

(About 1400 parts)

Sry for mispelling i'm from germany
